verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>, How long will you <S%H56>mourn<s%> for <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, seeing I have <S%H3988>rejected<s%> him from <S%H4427>reigning<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? <S%H4390>fill<s%> your <S%H7161>horn<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H3212>go<s%>, I will <S%H7971>send<s%> you to <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> the <S%H1022>Beth<s%>–lehemite: for I have <S%H7200>provided<s%> me a <S%H4428>king<s%> among his <S%H1121>sons<s%>.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, How can I <S%H3212>go<s%>? if <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H2026>it<s%>, he will kill <S%H3068>me<s%>. And the Lord <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> a <S%H1241>heifer<s%> with <S%H3027>you<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, I am <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> to the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>, and I will <S%H3045>show<s%> you what you shall <S%H6213>do<s%>: and you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> unto me him whom I name unto <S%H559>you<s%>.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1035>Beth<s%>–lehem. And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5892>town<s%> <S%H2729>trembled<s%> at his <S%H7125>coming<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H935>Come<s%> you <S%H7965>peaceably<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7965>Peaceably<s%>: I am <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H935>yourselves<s%>, and come with me to the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>. And he <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> them to the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>.
And it came to <S%H935>pass<s%>, when they were come, that he <S%H7200>looked<s%> on <S%H446>Eliab<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Surely the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s anointed is before <S%H4899>him<s%>.

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>, <S%H5027>Look<s%> not on his <S%H4758>favor<s%>, or on the <S%H1364>height<s%> of his <S%H6967>stature<s%>; because I have <S%H3988>refused<s%> <S%H120>him<s%>: for the Lord sees not as man <S%H7200>sees<s%>; for <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7200>looks<s%> on the outward <S%H5869>appearance<s%>, but the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>looks<s%> on the <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

Then <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H41>Abinadab<s%>, and made him <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Neither has the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> chosen <S%H977>this<s%>.
Then <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> made <S%H8048>Shammah<s%> to pass <S%H5674>by<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Neither has the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> chosen <S%H977>this<s%>.

<S%H3448>Again<s%>, Jesse made <S%H7651>seven<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>. And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has not chosen <S%H977>these<s%>.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>, Are here <S%H8552>all<s%> your <S%H5288>sons<s%>? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, There <S%H7604>remains<s%> yet the <S%H6996>youngest<s%>, <S%H7462>and<s%>, behold, he keeps the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>. And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>, <S%H7971>Send<s%> and <S%H3947>fetch<s%> <S%H5437>him<s%>: for we will not sit down until he <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%>.

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%>, and brought him <S%H935>in<s%>. Now he was <S%H132>ruddy<s%>, and <S%H5973>had<s%> a <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> <S%H5869>face<s%>, and <S%H2896>good<s%> to look <S%H7210>upon<s%>. And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, anoint <S%H4886>him<s%>: for this is he.

Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> him in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of his <S%H251>brothers<s%>: and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6743>came<s%> upon <S%H1732>David<s%> from that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H4605>forward<s%>. So <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>.
But the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5493>departed<s%> from <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> troubled <S%H1204>him<s%>.
And <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7451>him<s%>, Behold now, an evil <S%H7307>spirit<s%> from <S%H430>God<s%> troubles <S%H1204>you<s%>.

Let our <S%H113>lord<s%> now <S%H559>command<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%>, which are <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1245>you<s%>, to seek out a <S%H376>man<s%>, who is a <S%H3045>skillful<s%> <S%H5059>player<s%> on a <S%H3658>harp<s%>: and it shall come to <S%H7451>pass<s%>, when the evil <S%H7307>spirit<s%> from <S%H430>God<s%> is upon <S%H5059>you<s%>, that he shall play with his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and you shall be <S%H2895>well<s%>.
And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, <S%H7200>Provide<s%> me now a <S%H376>man<s%> that can <S%H5059>play<s%> <S%H3190>well<s%>, and bring him to <S%H935>me<s%>.

Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H5288>servants<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7200>Behold<s%>, I have seen a <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> the <S%H1022>Beth<s%>–lehemite, that is <S%H3045>skillful<s%> in <S%H5059>playing<s%>, and a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> valiant <S%H2428>man<s%>, and a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, and <S%H995>prudent<s%> in <S%H1697>matters<s%>, and a <S%H8389>comely<s%> <S%H376>person<s%>, and the Lord is with <S%H3068>him<s%>.

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> unto <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7971>Send<s%> me <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%>, which is with the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>.

And <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> an <S%H2543>donkey<s%> loaded with <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and a <S%H4997>bottle<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H1423>kid<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> them <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> unto <S%H7586>Saul<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H157>him<s%>: and he loved him <S%H3966>greatly<s%>; and he became his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let <S%H1732>David<s%>, I pray <S%H5975>you<s%>, stand <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4672>me<s%>; for he has found <S%H2580>favor<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%>.

And it came to <S%H7307>pass<s%>, when the evil spirit from <S%H430>God<s%> was upon <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> an <S%H3658>harp<s%>, and <S%H5059>played<s%> with his <S%H3027>hand<s%>: so <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H7304>refreshed<s%>, and was <S%H2895>well<s%>, and the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> departed from <S%H5493>him<s%>.
